ygData.msgSnippet: Directions from Nerik: ??? I know you go Neriak to Nuktulos To EC to WC to Kirthicor, in the woods which way to Misty , n,w,s,e.... Anf from there....? Thanks
ygData.messageBody:
Directions from Nerik: ???

I know you go Neriak to Nuktulos To EC to WC to Kirthicor, in the woods
which way to Misty , n,w,s,e.... Anf from there....?

Thanks
Chris Drew
Remlin Ryal, Warlord of House Ryal
Rallos Zek

-----Original Message-----
From: Howard Chan <hchan@...>
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, June 06, 1999 4:08 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Why are you playing a SK


>From: "Howard Chan" <hchan@...>
>
>>Directions to this place? How much or is loot?
>>Where is Runnyeye?
>
>Runnyeye is beside Misty Thicket. The blackened armor is obtained as loot.
>This place is for level 20 or so, but I bought mine at an earlier stage for
>400pp.
>
>
>
>>Where's the best place to buy banded, or get it as loot??
>
>Banded armor can be made through smithing. And while I'm at it, I'll
>advertise my prices hehe. If you were on Mithaniel Marr, I would gladly
make
>them for you for the following price:
>Tunic: 19pp, Pants: 14pp, Mantle: 12pp, Helm: 10pp, Sleeves: 8pp, Mask:
7pp,
>Belt: 7pp, Bracer: 3pp, Gorget: 3pp, Boots: 6pp
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Give back to your community through "Grow to Give."
>http://www.onelist.com
>Deadline is June 19. See homepage for details.
